description: Structured information about the amount of a given chemical that was used.
label: Amount of chemical
name: AmountOfChemical

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/amount._instruction: When used in a mixture, enter the amount of the substance within the mixture (e.g., as concentration or as ratio). When used in its pure state, enter the used amount of the substance.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/amount.label: Amount
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/amount.name: amount

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/chemica._instruction: Add the chemical product that was used.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/chemica.label: Chemical product
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/chemica.name: chemicalProduct
